content: The Tiger Tally is another tiger-themed item you can find in Chapter 2 of Black Myth: Wukong, specifically a Curios item. It is one of the harder Curios items to find as it is located within the secret area of Chapter 2.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Tiger_Tally.md', within the main section titled 'Tiger Tally'.
The content is as follows:
The Tiger Tally is another tiger-themed item you can find in Chapter 2 of Black Myth: Wukong, specifically a Curios item. It is one of the harder Curios items to find as it is located within the secret area of Chapter 2.
